summary: This mod adds orcs Skyrim tattoos in two versions
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This mod adds orcs Skyrim tattoos in two versions:
In the first embodiment mainly Celtic patterns used on the back of the skull.
In the second embodiment, mainly depicted skulls and demons.
Both options are great this race,
these tattoos will look like your orc
even more frightening and courageous.

Setting:
Select the version you want tattoos
and copy the files from the archive in the fashion Skyrim / data,
connect esp. in the launcher

Removal:
Delete files from the mod Skyrim / data
author: Drow33
